description:
Role: Java Lead with Python and AWS
Location: Dallas, TX
Required Total Years of Experience: 10+ Years.
JD:
Qualifications
· 7+ years of application programming and solutioning experience using Java/Spring/Spring-boot, Python and AWS technologies.
· Proven experience in designing, developing, testing and integration of high complexity software solutions.
· Knowledge of software design patterns/architecture like Micro-services, Layered pattern, etc
· Experience with AWS managed services including Lambda, Lambda step functions, SQS, SNS, Glue, Event Bridge, ECS/EKS Fargate, Secrets Manager
· Experience in designing and developing event driven architectures using AWS MSK or Confluent
· Experience storage services including S3, Aurora Postgres (SQL), MongoDB (NoSQL)
· Experience with API Gateway, OIDC providers including Ping and Cognito
· Working knowledge of JSON Web Tokens (JWT)
· Experience with Chef and Terraform
· Functional skills Application Development Life Cycle / Waterfall and Agile Development, System Design and Architecture, DevOps / Deployment automation
Job Types: Full-time, Contract
Salary: $65.00 - $75.00 per hour
Schedule:
8 hour shift
Experience:
AWS: 4 years (Preferred)
Python: 4 years (Preferred)
Microservices: 4 years (Preferred)
Waterfall and Agile Development: 3 years (Preferred)
Java Lead: 3 years (Preferred)
Java: 10 years (Preferred)
Work Location: Remote
Show Less
